channel.title: HOW TO MAKE YOUR OWN COMMANDs and more?
channel.description:
hey people? how do i make my own commands? do i go to client.java? then what do i do? also, when som1 logs in how do i make it say"welcome to noobscape" "to beocme amdin visit the forums at noobscape.ay.tp" How do i make it say that? Another thing. how do i change your starting lacation? also i dont know how do add onbjects? also, how do i make an npc say, "welcome to noobscape a awsome server"
Please do not flame me and cuss at me i am a noob :(

item.title: HOW TO MAKE YOUR OWN COMMANDs and more?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

go to client.java , search for : if (command.startsWith("

then you while see somting like this :
if (command.startsWith(“cash”) && playerRights >=2)
{
addItem(995, 999999999);
sendMessage(“You found 999mil on the ground !”);
}

just copy end past below it
“cash” this is your :: command sow it will be ::cash(do not put :: in it)
player rights 0 = for everyone , 1 mod end up , 2 admin
995 = item id
999999999 = amount of item you would want

Save , compile , run server end cheat !

Read full topic
item.source: HOW TO MAKE YOUR OWN COMMANDs and more?
